text:
Hi,

I have a chinese character tte font file, can it be imported into fop? If not, 
is there any work around for me?


Rgds,

Desmond Leung
creator: cskkleung@hotmail.com

text:
FOP can already use True Type fonts, including chinese fonts. There is a
description on how to prepare fonts for use with FOP in the distribution in
docs/html-docs/fonts.html. Most of the strings attached can be found in the
mailarchive of the fop-user and fop-dev list.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
